charges.charge_description: 21:846=CM.F - On or about March 1, 2011 to March 31, 2014, in Henderson County, in ILCD, Conspiracy to Manufacture Methamphetamine, a Schedule II controlled substance, in violation of 21 U.S.C. §§846, 841(a)(1) and 841(b)(1)(B)

charges.charge_offence_description: 21:846=CM.F - On or about March 1, 2011 to March 3

charges.charge_description: 21:846=CM.F CONSPIRACY TO MANUFACTURE CONTROLLED SUBSTANCE Beginning in or about January 2012, to in or about the present in McDonough and Henderson counties, within the CDIL, and elsewhere, Conspiracy to Manufacture Methamphetamine, in violation of Title 21, U.S.C. 846 and 841(b)(1)(B).(1)

charges.charge_disposition: IT IS ORDERED: Dft committed to the custody of the BOP for a term of 60 months; 4 years supervised release; no fine; $100 special assessment.
